mapper.select: SELECT FO.ORDERNO, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(FM.MENU, ' (', FD.COUNT, ')') SEPARATOR ', ') AS 'MENULIST', SUM(FD.COUNT * FD.UNITPRICE) AS 'TOTALAMOUNT', FO.USERID, FO.ORDERDATE FROM FOOD114_ORDERS FO INNER JOIN FOOD114_ORDER_DETAIL FD ON FO.ORDERNO = FD.ORDERNO INNER JOIN FOOD114_MENU FM ON FD.MENUNO = FM.MENUNO WHERE FO.BIZID = #{bizId} GROUP BY FO.ORDERNO, FO.USERID, FO.ORDERDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FOOD114_ORDERS WHERE BIZID = #{bizId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD114_ORDERS (USERID, BIZID, ORDERDATE,STATUS) VALUES(#{userId}, #{bizId}, NOW(),#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE FOOD114_ORDERS SET ADDR = #{addr}, DETAIL = #{detail}, PHONE = #{phone}, ORDERREQUEST = #{orderRequest}, DELIVERYREQUEST = #{deliveryRequest} WHERE ORDERNO = #{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT DATEDATE AS DAY,SUM(SUMSUM) AS SUM FROM (SELECT O.ORDERNO, SUM(UNITPRICE * COUNT) AS SUMSUM, DATE_FORMAT(O.ORDERDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATEDATE FROM FOOD114_ORDERS O INNER JOIN FOOD114_ORDER_DETAIL D ON O.ORDERNO = D.ORDERNO WHERE BIZID = #{bizId} GROUP BY O.ORDERNO) T GROUP BY T.DATEDATE
